underlying_goal: Audit, optimize, and reduce costs of Apify actor integrations used in the content research pipeline, replacing broken/expensive actors and documenting the changes for handover
friction_detail: Claude attempted LinkedIn 'Top' sort which returned worse results; user pointed out keyword search isn't useful for trending content discovery, which Claude hadn't recognized proactively.
brief_summary: User wanted to audit Apify actors for cost and functionality, replace broken/expensive ones with cheaper alternatives, remove a useless pipeline step, and create a handover document â€” most of which was successfully completed with significant cost savings.
